#Rstats: Repeated measures ANOVA is traditionally quite irksome to perform in R. The `afex` package changes this. Easily specify a rm-model that gives identical results to SPSS using `afex::aov_car`. Automatically applies the GG correction. 

install.packages("afex")

Hi #Rstats twitter. Know the struggle with copy-pasting win explorer paths to your R session and converting \ to \\ or / ?
Since R 4.0.0 you can actually just path <- r"(test\test)" to evade this problem 😁.
This is old news but I got a feeling that now everybody knows. https://t.co/KRfvG96Dtq
